description:
| We invite You on the journey of making Exponea and it's multi-terabyte
  in- memory databases possible in the containerized environment of the
  Google Cloud.
| Join us as we grasp the wheel of our multi-server hardware-based
  spaceship, navigate through the dangerous oceans of no-downtime live
  migrations to safely dock in the calm waters of Google bay or did we?
title: To the Google in 80 Days
